#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   int t,i,sum;
   char str[100],c;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       sum=0;
       cin>>str;
       int *a=new int[strlen(str)];
       for(i=0;i<strlen(str);i++)
       {
           a[i]=str[i];
           sum=sum+a[i];
       }
       sum=sum/strlen(str);
       c=sum;
       cout<<c<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
